text:
October 1$$ 1956
Mr, Joseph Golden
Assistant Professor of Speech
Elmira College
Elmira, New York
Dear Mr, Goldens
Reference is made to your letter of October 10 addressed
to Dr. Skornia. Dr, Skoraia is on a trip out of town and
will not be back in his office until after October 22.
four letter will be called to his attention upon his return
and I*m sure you*11 hear from him shortly thereafter.
Sincerely,
Maiy F. Bryner (Mrs.)
Secretary to Dr. Skornia
